page.title: 19DOCTORS:LINCS. MID WOLDS
page.content:
{ Doctors }have to travel many miles to visit their patients.Some have their own dispensary to provide pat- ients with medicines.This saves isol- ated country people without private transport,from having to travel into town.There is little Public Transport.
Many doctors belong to{L.I.V.E.S., an emergency service which is used when there has been a bad accident. They are contacted by radio and have essential life-saving equipment in their cars,and are trained to work in emergencies.They save lives because they can give specialist treatment before the ambulances arrive. { {The main aim of health care}in this area is to prevent people getting ill, but if they do fall sick,there are many qualified people to help them.
